entry.title: Configuring mpv player - no border, loop and saving position on quit

link.title: Configuring mpv player - no border, loop and saving position on quit

entry.content:
mpv is one of the best video players on Linux. Its available on Windows and Mac also. Lets find out how we can configure this awesome video player:

There are two different methods:

Command line (set everytime you use)

No border

$ mpv --no-border video.mp4

Video loop

$ mpv --loop video.mp4

Edit config file (set once and for all)

Using your preferred text editor (like vim), open the file /home/$USER/.config/mpv/mpv.conf. If this file does not exists, create it.

Add following code to the file mpv.conf

loop=yes #Playing video will loop
border=no #Remove border
save-position-on-quit=yes #Save last position of playing video

Save the file, close it, and restart mpv player. Now it should be as you wanted. Enjoy!

entry.title: What are domain names, how do they work and how to get one

link.title: What are domain names, how do they work and how to get one

entry.content:
We have seen lots of branded domain names like google.com, facebook.com . This site also have a domain name letscreatefuture.com . So what is the deal, and what are domain names, especially new domain names like .io, .photo, .website or even .me so much used these days?

In this article, i want to explain what are domain names and answer some of the most common questions related to them. Here you will learn:

  • What is a domain name?
  • What is DNS (Domain Name System)
  • Difference between URL, domain name, sub domain, and domain extension.
  • What are uses of domain names.
  • Where can you buy domain names

What is a domain name?

In the real world every house and location has an address, in the same way on internet a domain name is the address of your website.

Domain names are addresses of places on internet.

Why do we need domain names?

If you want your own website, you are going to need a domain name. By entering the domain name in the browser someone will reach your website. Thats a address of your website which anyone can remember. Thats why people choose memorable domain names so that many people remember it.

Your domain name is the first point of contact between you brand and your customers.

Example of domain name

Some examples are www.google.com, emroline.com, facebook.com.

How do domain names work?

Using DNS domain names resolve yo IP address of the host that has the website running.

How to get a domain name?

You can go to any domain name provider website and buy a domain name. Some famous providers are godaddy, namecheap and epik.com
